actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the exemption from the special fuels tax for qualified methanol and ethanol fuel shall apply where the alcohol in such fuel is produced from natural gas.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the exemption from the special motor fuels excise tax for qualified methanol and ethanol fuel shall apply where the alcohol in such fuel is produced from natural gas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the exemption from the special fuels tax for qualified methanol and ethanol fuel shall apply where the alcohol in such fuel is produced from natural gas.
